cyclone.name: ROSLYN
cyclone.current_location: about 175 mi (280 km) SW of Manzanillo, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Roslyn is forecast to turn north-northwest then north-northeast and accelerate toward the west-central coast of Mexico, making landfall in the Nayarit/Jalisco region before moving inland over west-central Mexico.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: west-central Mexico near the Nayarit/Jalisco coast (just north of Cabo Corrientes)
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: N/A (system never approaches the Gulf side near Brownsville, TX)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch north of El Roblito to Mazatlán, west-central Mexico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Playa Pérula to El Roblito, including Islas Marías; Tropical Storm Warning south of Playa Pérula to Manzanillo
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southwestern and west-central Mexico from Manzanillo northward to Mazatlán, including Islas Marías
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Not applicable (cyclone remains on Pacific side)
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (no wind-probability point near Brownsville, TX)
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Brownsville, TX
